Texts.Chs: 把^orange;坚硬的怪物金属板^reset;带给^green;凯文^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;Kevin, your overlord^reset; heaps of ^green;Monster Plate^reset;
Can you do me a favor? I need someone to murder like....500 things. I need Monster Plate and am far too lazy to do it myself. Go on, then. I'll pay.
Thanks. Have this significant sum of money. Also this stupid contract. I'm done with you. Bugger off, little peon.
